The PAWS Act would require the VA to assist nonprofits that provide service dogs to our brave veterans suffering from PTSD or other post-deployment mental health concerns. 

After sacrificing so much for our country, our #veterans are entitled to the best treatment available.

Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder is a leading cause of veteran suicide; however, one of the best treatments for #PTSD isn‚Äôt covered by the VA. This is why I‚Äôm proud to cosponsor the Puppies Assisting Wounded Servicemembers (PAWS) for Veterans Therapy Act.
